action.RemoveAllBut1SpeciesOnEachTile: Remove all but 1 of your Species on each Tile

ABUNDANCE.name: Abundance
ABUNDANCE.description: Select an Element from the Abundance box and then select a vacant Corner to place it on

ADAPTATION.name: Adaptation
ADAPTATION.description: Select an Element from the Adaptation box to add to your Animal

COMPETITION.name: Competition
COMPETITION.description: Select an Opposing Species on a Tile (one of each type matching the AP) to eliminate 1 of that Species from the Tile

DEPLETION.name: Depletion
DEPLETION.description: Select an Element on Earth to place back into the draw bag

DOMINATION.name: Domination
DOMINATION.description: Select a Tile (that hasn't been scored this round) to score it. Then the dominant animal must select and execute a Card.

GLACIATION.name: Glaciation
GLACIATION.description: Select a non-Tundra Tile (adjacent to a Tundra tile) to turn it into Tundra as well

INITIATIVE.name: Initiative
INITIATIVE.description:
At the start of the Execution Phase, remove any AP that was placed here.
That player performs the following activities:
  • On the Initiative track, swap his animal’s initiative marker with that of the animal directly to the left of it—thus effectively moving one space forward on the Initiative track.
    Ignore this activity if the acting animal already occupies
    the front (left-most) Initiative spot.
  • Place the AP that was just removed into any vacant eye-ball space.

MIGRATION.name: Migration
MIGRATION.description: Select a Tile to move species from, then select an adjacent Tile to move them to. You may move up to the number of species indicated with the Action Pawn. Birds species may move up to 2 tiles away.

REGRESSION.name: Regression
REGRESSION.description: Select Elements (up to the number of Action Pawns you placed) from the Regression box that you don't want to be removed from your Animal

SPECIATION.name: Speciation
SPECIATION.description: Select an Element on Earth and then select adjacent Tiles to place up to 4 new Species on them

WANDERLUST.name: Wanderlust
WANDERLUST.description: Select a Tile from the Wanderlust Tiles and then select a blank hex to place it on. Then you may select an Element from the Wanderlust box and select a vacant corner on the newly placed tile to place it on.

WASTELAND.name: Wasteland
WASTELAND.description: Select Element from the Wasteland box to place it back into the draw bag

AQUATIC.name: Aquatic
AQUATIC.description: Place 1 element onto a sea or wetland tile. Place up to 4 species from your GP onto that same tile.

BIODIVERSITY.name: Biodiversity
BIODIVERSITY.description: Gain 1 VP for each tile that you share with 1 or more opposing species.

BIOMASS.name: Biomass
BIOMASS.description: Eliminate 1 species on each tile containing more species than element markers.

BLIGHT.name: Blight
BLIGHT.description: Remove all but 1 element marker from a tile of your choice.

CATASTROPHE.name: Catastrophe
CATASTROPHE.description: Select 1 tile and eliminate all but 1 species. Then eliminate 1 species on each adjacent tile.

COLD_SNAP.name: Cold Snap
COLD_SNAP.description: All other players must eliminate 1 of their own species from every tundra tile.

DISEASE.name: Disease
DISEASE.description: Each player having more elements than you loses 1 element of their choice.

ECODIVERSITY.name: Ecodiversity
ECODIVERSITY.description: Gain 1 VP for each element token on the board that matches any element type of yours.

EVOLUTION.name: Evolution
EVOLUTION.description: Select up to 2 other players and replace 1 of each of their species anywhere on the board with 1 of yours.

FECUNDITY.name: Fecundity
FECUNDITY.description: Place up to 1 species from your GP onto every tile already containing 1 of your species.

FERTILE.name: Fertile
FERTILE.description: Select 1 tile you have at least 1 of your species on and score VPs equal to the total number of species there.

HABITAT.name: Habitat
HABITAT.description: Pick 1 element to add to the board.

HIBERNATION.name: Hibernation
HIBERNATION.description: Place up to 5 of your eliminated species onto any 1 tile. They ignore Extinction this turn.

ICE_AGE.name: Ice Age
ICE_AGE.description: Each player scores bonus VPs based on the number of domination markers they have on the board.

IMMIGRANTS.name: Immigrants
IMMIGRANTS.description: In FC order, all players pick to lose 1 element, 1 AP or all but one of their species on each tile they’re on.

INSTINCT.name: Instinct
INSTINCT.description: Place 1 of your APs into any vacant eyeball space.

INTELLIGENCE.name: Intelligence
INTELLIGENCE.description: You and each player above you in the FC gets 1 new AP.

MASS_EXODUS.name: Mass Exodus
MASS_EXODUS.description: Select 1 tile and move all species from there to 1 or more adjacent tiles.

METAMORPHOSIS.name: Metamorphosis
METAMORPHOSIS.description: Swap 1 of your elements with 1 of your choice from the bag.

NICHE_BIOMES.name: Niche Biomes
NICHE_BIOMES.description: Each player having more VPs than you loses VPs = to 1 place value of the tile just scored.

NOCTURNAL.name: Noctural
NOCTURNAL.description: Move your initiative marker 1 space to the left.

PARASITISM.name: Parasitism
PARASITISM.description: You and each player below you in the FC gets 1 new AP.

PREDATOR.name: Predator
PREDATOR.description: Eliminate 1 opposing species on every tile you occupy.

SYMBIOTIC.name: Symbiotic
SYMBIOTIC.description: You and each player with fewer elements than you gets 1 random element from the bag.

errors.ACTION_SPACE_NOT_ALLOWED: You cannot place an Action Pawn in this Action Space.
errors.ALREADY_ELEMENT_AT_CORNER: There already is an Element on this corner.
errors.ALREADY_TILE_AT_HEX: There already is a Tile at this hex.
errors.CANNOT_MOVE_THROUGH_BLANK_HEX: You cannot move species through a blank hex.
errors.CANNOT_SKIP_MORE_ELEMENT_TYPES_THAN_ACTI: You cannot skip more Element types than you have placed Action Pawns.
errors.DUPLICATE_TILES: You may not specify duplicate tiles.
errors.DUPLICATE_TILE_TYPES: You may not specify duplicate tile types.
errors.ELEMENT_NOT_IN_DEPLETION_BOX: This element is not in the Depletion box.
errors.ELEMENT_NOT_IN_DRAW_BAG: This element is not in the draw bag.
errors.ELEMENT_NOT_IN_REGRESSION_BOX: This element is not in the Regression box
errors.MAX_4_SPECIES_ALLOWED: You can place at most 4 Species.
errors.MAX_5_ELIMINATED_SPECIES_ALLOWED: You can place at most 5 eliminated Species.
errors.MAX_DISTANCE_EXCEEDED: You cannot move Species further than the maximum distance for the Animal.
errors.MAX_ELEMENTS_REACHED: You cannot add more Elements to your Animal.
errors.MAX_SPECIES_EXCEEDED: You cannot move more Species than the maximum indicated by the Action Pawn.
errors.MUST_BE_ADJACENT_TO_AQUATIC_TILE: Tiles must be adjacent to a Wetland or Sea tile.
errors.MUST_BE_ADJACENT_TO_ELEMENT: Species must be placed adjacent to the selected Element.
errors.MUST_BE_ADJACENT_TO_TILE: Element must be placed on a vacant Corner adjacent to the selected Tile.
errors.MUST_BE_ADJACENT_TO_TUNDRA_TILE: Tile must be adjacent to a tundra Tile.
errors.MUST_BE_MAMMALS: You must control the Mammals to save Species from Extinction.
errors.MUST_MOVE_ALL_SPECIES_ON_TILE: You must move all Species on the Tile to adjacent Tiles.
errors.MUST_SELECT_ALL_ADJACENT_TILES: You must select all adjacent Tiles.
errors.MUST_SELECT_ALL_AFFECTED_TILES: You must select all Tiles that have more Species than adjacent Elements on them.
errors.MUST_SELECT_ALL_BUT_1_ELEMENT_ON_TILE: You must select all but 1 Element on the Tile.
errors.MUST_SELECT_ALL_TILES_OCCUPIED_BY_PLAYER: You must select all Tiles occupied by your Animal.
errors.MUST_SELECT_ANIMAL_FOR_EACH_TILE: You must select an Animal on each Tile.
errors.MUST_SELECT_AT_LEAST_1_TILE: You must select at least 1 Tile.
errors.MUST_SELECT_UP_TO_2_TILES: You must select up to 2 Tiles.
errors.MUST_SELECT_UP_TO_3_TILES: You must select up to 3 Tiles.
errors.MUST_SPECIFY_SPECIES_FOR_EACH_TILE: You must specify the Species for each Tile.
errors.NOT_CURRENT_PLAYER: You cannot perform an action because you are not the current player.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_ELIMINATED_SPECIES: Your Animal does not have enough eliminated Species.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_SPECIES_IN_GENE_POOL: Your Animal does not have enough Species in its Gene Pool.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_SPECIES_ON_TILE: There are not enough Species on the Tile.
errors.NO_ACTION_PAWN: There is no Action Pawn for the current Animal on the current Action Type.
errors.NO_ACTION_TO_SKIP: There is not action to skip.
errors.NO_ELEMENTS_IN_DRAW_BAG: There are no Elements left in the Draw Bag.
errors.NO_ELEMENT_AT_CORNER: There is no Element at the corner.
errors.NO_TUNDRA_TILE_AVAILABLE: There is no tundra Tile available.
errors.SPECIES_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: You must specify 1 or more species to add or remove.
errors.TILE_ALREADY_SCORED: This Tile is already scored this turn.
errors.TILE_NOT_OCCUPIED_BY_PLAYER: You must select Tiles occupied by your Animal.

instruction.Adaptation: Adaptation: Select an Element from the Adaptation box to add to your Animal
instruction.Aquatic: Aquatic: Select an Element Type from the draw bag and then select a vacant Corner of a Wetland or Sea tile to place it on. You may then add up to 4 new Species on that Wetland or Sea tile.
instruction.Abundance: Abundance: Select an Element from the Abundance box and then select a vacant Corner to place it on
instruction.Blight: Blight: Select 1 Tile and then select ALL but 1 Elements on that Tile to remove
instruction.Catastrophe: Catastrophe: Select 1 Tile and then 1 Species to eliminate ALL other Species on that tile and then select 1 Species on each adjacent tile to eliminate.
instruction.Competition: Competition: Select an Opposing Species on a Tile (one of each type matching the AP) to eliminate 1 of that Species from the Tile
instruction.Depletion: Depletion: Select an Element on Earth to place back into the draw bag
instruction.DominanceCard: Domination (Card): Select a Card from the display to execute it.
instruction.Domination: Domination: Select a Tile (that hasn't been scored this round) to score it. Then the dominant animal must select and execute a Card.
instruction.Evolution: Evolution: Select up to 2 species of different opposing players to replace each of them with one species of your own.
instruction.Glaciation: Glaciation: Select a non-Tundra Tile (adjacent to a Tundra tile) to turn it into Tundra as well
instruction.Habitat: Habitat: Select an Element (from the Draw Bag) and then select a vacant Corner to place it on.
instruction.PlaceActionPawn: Place Action Pawn: Select a vacant Action Space to place an Action Pawn
instruction.Regression: Regression: Select Elements (up to the number of Action Pawns you placed) from the Regression box that you don't want to be removed from your Animal
instruction.Speciation: Speciation: Select an Element on Earth and then select adjacent Tiles to place up to 4 new Species on them. Insects (Free Action): Select any Tile to place 1 Species on that Tile.
instruction.MassExodus: MassExodus: Select a Tile and then move all Species on that tile to adjacent Tiles by selecting one or more Species on the tile and then selecting an adjacent Tile to move them to onto that Tile.
instruction.Migration: Migration: Select a Tile to move species from, then select an adjacent Tile to move them to. You may move up to the number of species indicated with the Action Pawn. Birds species may move up to 2 tiles away.
instruction.Predator: Predator: Select 1 opposing Species on each Tile you occupy to eliminate it
instruction.RemoveElement: Remove element: Select an Element from your Animal to remove
instruction.SaveFromExtinction: Save from Extinction: Select a Tile on which to save 1 of your Endangered Species from Extinction.
instruction.Wanderlust: Wanderlust: Select a Tile from the Wanderlust Tiles and then select a blank hex to place it on. Then you may select an Element from the Wanderlust box and select a vacant corner on the newly placed tile to place it on.
instruction.WanderlustMove: Wanderlust (Move): Select one or more Tiles with your species currently adjacent to the newly-placed tile to move all, none or some of them onto that tile.
instruction.Wasteland: Wasteland: Select Element from the Wasteland box to place it back into the draw bag

log.ABUNDANCE: adds Element {{value2}} to Earth at {{value3}} through Abundance
log.ADD_ELEMENT: adds Element {{value2}} to newly placed tile
log.CATASTROPHE: Catastrophe: selects {{value4}} Tile at {{value3}} to eliminate all Species but 1 of {{value2}}
log.COMPETITION: eliminates 1 species of {{value2}} from {{value4}} tile at {{value3}} through Competition
log.DOMINATION: selects {{value3}} Tile at {{value2}} (where {{value4}} are dominant) for Domination
log.ELIMINATE_SPECIES: eliminates {{value3}} species of {{value2}} from {{value5}} tile at {{value4}}
log.EXTINCTION: Extinction: {{value2}} species of {{value1}} are eliminated from {{value4}} tile at {{value3}}
log.GAIN_VPS_FROM_TILE: {{value1}} gain {{value2}} VPs from scoring {{value4}} Tile at {{value3}}
log.HIBERNATION: {{value2}} eliminated species of {{value1}} are added to {{value4}} tile at {{value3}} and ignore extinction this turn
log.INITIATIVE: Initiative: {{value1}} are now #{{value2}} on the Initiative Track
log.MIGRATION: moves {{value2}} species of {{value1}} from {{value4}} tile at {{value3}} to {{value6}} tile at {{value5}} through Migration
log.MOVE_SPECIES: moves {{value3}} species of {{value2}} from {{value5}} tile at {{value4}} to {{value7}} tile at {{value6}}
log.PLACE_ACTION_PAWN: places Action Pawn for {{value1}} on {{value2}} in space #{{value3}}
log.REMOVE_ALL_SPECIES_BUT_1: removes all species but 1 of {{value4}} from {{value3}} tile at {{value2}}
log.REMOVE_SPECIES: removes {{value3}} species of {{value2}} from {{value5}} tile at {{value4}}
log.SAVE_FROM_EXTINCTION: saves 1 Species of Mammals on {{value2}} tile at {{value3}}
log.SPECIATION: adds {{value2}} species of {{value1}} to {{value4}} tile {{value3}} through Speciation
log.WANDERLUST: takes {{value3}} tile from Wanderlust Tiles #{{value2}} and places it on {{value4}}
log.WASTELAND: places Element {{value2}} back in the draw bag through Wasteland
